on-hit

1.text: Senna's basic attacks can  critically strike, but they deal only 「 (160.125% +  32.025%) AD physical damage. 」「 91.5% of the  critical damage champions usually have. 」

2.text: Senna has an attack ratio of 0.3, meaning she only gains「 + 0.3 attack speed per  100% bonus attack speed. 」「 48% of the attack speed she would gain if her attack speed ratio was the same as her base attack speed. 」
2.html: Senna has an attack ratio of 0.3, meaning she only gains「 + 0.3 attack speed per  100% bonus attack speed. 」「 48% of the attack speed she would gain if her attack speed ratio was the same as her base attack speed. 」

3.text: Additionally, Senna's base attack windup is reduced「 to 31.25% − 21.875% (based on level), 」「 by 0% − 30% (based on level), 」but is only reduced by 60% of the expected value given attack speed bonuses.

1.text: EFFECT RADIUS:  2000

0.text: Innate - Weakened Soul: Senna's basic attacks  on-hit and damaging abilities on enemy champions apply a stack of Mist for 4 seconds, modified to 0.75 seconds if Senna starts winding up a basic attack on them. Subsequent hits will collect Mist and deal bonus physical damage equal to 1% − 10% (based on level) of target's current health, rendering the target immune to further Mist applications for a few seconds. This damage applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.
0.html: Innate - Weakened Soul: Senna's basic attacks on-hit and damaging abilities on enemy champions apply a stack of Mist for 4 seconds, modified to 0.75 seconds if Senna starts winding up a basic attack on them. Subsequent hits will collect Mist and deal bonus physical damage equal to 1% − 10% (based on level) of target's current health, rendering the target immune to further Mist applications for a few seconds. This damage applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.
markedPassages: on-hit
1% − 10% (based on level) of target's current health
1% − 10% (based on level) of target's current health
life steal

1.text:
Enemies that die near Senna may spawn a Mist Wraith from their corpse. A Mist Wraith lasts 8 seconds and Senna can basic attack or hit it with  Piercing Darkness or  Dawning Shadow to kill them instantly, granting her  8 and collecting their Mist.
Enemy  champions and large  monsters will spawn a Mist Wraith.
Epic  monsters will spawn 2 Mist Wraiths.
 Minions and lesser  monsters that Senna kills have a 8.3% chance to spawn a Mist Wraith.
Large  minions that Senna does not kill will spawn a Mist Wraith, while lesser  minions and lesser  monsters that Senna does not kill have a 28% chance to spawn.
1.html:
Enemies that die near Senna may spawn a Mist Wraith from their corpse. A Mist Wraith lasts 8 seconds and Senna can basic attack or hit it with Piercing Darkness or Dawning Shadow to kill them instantly, granting her 8 and collecting their Mist.

  • Enemy champions and large monsters will spawn a Mist Wraith.
  • Epic monsters will spawn 2 Mist Wraiths.
  • Minions and lesser monsters that Senna kills have a 8.3% chance to spawn a Mist Wraith.
  • Large minions that Senna does not kill will spawn a Mist Wraith, while lesser minions and lesser monsters that Senna does not kill have a 28% chance to spawn.
markedPassages: Piercing Darkness
Dawning Shadow
8
champions
monsters
monsters
Minions
monsters
minions
minions
monsters

2.text: Mist: For each stack of Mist, Senna gains  0.75 bonus attack damage. For every 20 stacks, she also gains  20 bonus attack range and  10% critical strike chance, capped at 100% critical strike chance. Additionally, 35% of the generated excess critical strike chance is converted into  life steal.
2.html: Mist: For each stack of Mist, Senna gains  0.75 bonus attack damage. For every 20 stacks, she also gains  20 bonus attack range and  10% critical strike chance, capped at 100% critical strike chance. Additionally, 35% of the generated excess critical strike chance is converted into  life steal.

20 bonus attack range
10% critical strike chance
life steal

3.text: Innate - Relic Cannon: Senna's basic attacks  on-hit deal 20% AD bonus physical damage and grant her 10 / 15 / 20% (based on level) of the target's movement speed as  bonus movement speed for 0.5 seconds. This damage applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.
3.html: Innate - Relic Cannon: Senna's basic attacks on-hit deal 20% AD bonus physical damage and grant her 10 / 15 / 20% (based on level) of the target's movement speed as  bonus movement speed for 0.5 seconds. This damage applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

bonus movement speed

1.text: COOLDOWN: 15

0.text: Active: Senna fires a spectral laser in the direction of the target unit,  healing herself and allied  champions hit, and dealing physical damage to enemies hit in a thinner line. Enemies hit are  slowed by 15% (+ 10% per 100 bonus AD) (+ 6% per 100 AP) for a duration. The damage against champions applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.
0.html: Active: Senna fires a spectral laser in the direction of the target unit, healing herself and allied champions hit, and dealing physical damage to enemies hit in a thinner line. Enemies hit are slowed by 15% (+ 10% per 100 bonus AD) (+ 6% per 100 AP) for a duration. The damage against champions applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

champions
slowed
life steal

1.text: Upon being hit, enemy  turrets,  wards, jungle plants,  Mist Wraiths and any other attack-interactive units are considered basic attacked once, while  champions and  turrets* are applied  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
1.html: Upon being hit, enemy turrets, wards, jungle plants, Mist Wraiths and any other attack-interactive units are considered basic attacked once, while champions and turrets* are applied on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

1.text: COOLDOWN: 11

0.text: Active: Senna throws a globule of Black Mist in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and attaches to them for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Senna throws a globule of Black Mist in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and attaches to them for 1 second.

1.text: After the duration or when the target dies, the Black Mist spreads out of the target,  rooting them and surrounding enemies for a few seconds.
1.html: After the duration or when the target dies, the Black Mist spreads out of the target, rooting them and surrounding enemies for a few seconds.
markedPassages: rooting

0.text: Active: Senna surrounds herself with an aura of mist and gains  camouflage for a duration. If Senna breaks the camouflage, she regains it after 1.75 seconds without performing actions that break stealth.
0.html: Active: Senna surrounds herself with an aura of mist and gains camouflage for a duration. If Senna breaks the camouflage, she regains it after 1.75 seconds without performing actions that break stealth.
markedPassages: camouflage

1.text: Allied champions who enter the mist gain Wraith Form for a duration equal to the remaining duration.
1.html: Allied champions who enter the mist gain Wraith Form for a duration equal to the remaining duration.

2.text: Wraith Form: Gain  camouflage. Enemies will have  obscured vision of camouflaged Wraiths moving outside of the mist. Wraith Form can be regained if lost by breaking the camouflage after 1.75 seconds without performing actions that break stealth. Wraith Form ends immediately upon Senna's  death.
2.html: Wraith Form: Gain camouflage. Enemies will have obscured vision of camouflaged Wraiths moving outside of the mist. Wraith Form can be regained if lost by breaking the camouflage after 1.75 seconds without performing actions that break stealth. Wraith Form ends immediately upon Senna's death.
markedPassages: camouflage
obscured vision
death

3.text: Senna and allies camouflaged by Curse of the Black Mist also gain  20% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed.
3.html: Senna and allies camouflaged by Curse of the Black Mist also gain  20% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed.
markedPassages: 20%

Active: Senna fires a spectral laser in the direction of the target unit,  healing herself and allied  champions hit, and dealing physical damage to enemies hit in a thinner line. Enemies hit are  slowed by 15% (+ 10% per 100 bonus AD) (+ 6% per 100 AP) for a duration. The damage against champions applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

textContent.text: Upon being hit, enemy  turrets,  wards, jungle plants,  Mist Wraiths and any other attack-interactive units are considered basic attacked once, while  champions and  turrets* are applied  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
textContent.html: Upon being hit, enemy turrets, wards, jungle plants, Mist Wraiths and any other attack-interactive units are considered basic attacked once, while champions and turrets* are applied on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

textContent.text: Piercing Darkness'   current cooldown is reduced by 1 second  on-hit.
textContent.html: Piercing Darkness'  current cooldown is reduced by 1 second on-hit.

textContent.text: Active: Senna throws a globule of Black Mist in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and attaches to them for 1 second.
textContent.html: Active: Senna throws a globule of Black Mist in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and attaches to them for 1 second.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Senna throws a globule of Black Mist in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and attaches to them for 1 second.

textContent.text: After the duration or when the target dies, the Black Mist spreads out of the target,  rooting them and surrounding enemies for a few seconds.
textContent.html: After the duration or when the target dies, the Black Mist spreads out of the target, rooting them and surrounding enemies for a few seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: After the duration or when the target dies, the Black Mist spreads out of the target,  rooting them and surrounding enemies for a few seconds.

textContent.text: Active: Senna surrounds herself with an aura of mist and gains  camouflage for a duration. If Senna breaks the camouflage, she regains it after 1.75 seconds without performing actions that break stealth.
textContent.html: Active: Senna surrounds herself with an aura of mist and gains camouflage for a duration. If Senna breaks the camouflage, she regains it after 1.75 seconds without performing actions that break stealth.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Senna surrounds herself with an aura of mist and gains  camouflage for a duration. If Senna breaks the camouflage, she regains it after 1.75 seconds without performing actions that break stealth.

textContent.text: Allied champions who enter the mist gain Wraith Form for a duration equal to the remaining duration.
textContent.html: Allied champions who enter the mist gain Wraith Form for a duration equal to the remaining duration.

textContent.text: Wraith Form: Gain  camouflage. Enemies will have  obscured vision of camouflaged Wraiths moving outside of the mist. Wraith Form can be regained if lost by breaking the camouflage after 1.75 seconds without performing actions that break stealth. Wraith Form ends immediately upon Senna's  death.
textContent.html: Wraith Form: Gain camouflage. Enemies will have obscured vision of camouflaged Wraiths moving outside of the mist. Wraith Form can be regained if lost by breaking the camouflage after 1.75 seconds without performing actions that break stealth. Wraith Form ends immediately upon Senna's death.

textContent.text: Senna and allies camouflaged by Curse of the Black Mist also gain  20% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed.
textContent.html: Senna and allies camouflaged by Curse of the Black Mist also gain  20% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed.

textContent.text: Active: Senna fires two waves of spectral light in the target direction, granting  sight of the area briefly along the path. The center wave deals physical damage to enemy  champions hit and  reveals them for 3 seconds. It also collects  Mist Wraiths it hits.
textContent.html: Active: Senna fires two waves of spectral light in the target direction, granting sight of the area briefly along the path. The center wave deals physical damage to enemy champions hit and reveals them for 3 seconds. It also collects Mist Wraiths it hits.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Senna fires two waves of spectral light in the target direction, granting  sight of the area briefly along the path. The center wave deals physical damage to enemy  champions hit and  reveals them for 3 seconds. It also collects  Mist Wraiths it hits.

Active: Senna fires a spectral laser in the direction of the target unit,  healing herself and allied  champions hit, and dealing physical damage to enemies hit in a thinner line. Enemies hit are  slowed by 15% (+ 10% per 100 bonus AD) (+ 6% per 100 AP) for a duration. The damage against champions applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

3.concerningText: Active: Senna throws a globule of Black Mist in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and attaches to them for 1 second.

4.concerningText: Active: Senna surrounds herself with an aura of mist and gains  camouflage for a duration. If Senna breaks the camouflage, she regains it after 1.75 seconds without performing actions that break stealth.

5.concerningText: Active: Senna fires two waves of spectral light in the target direction, granting  sight of the area briefly along the path. The center wave deals physical damage to enemy  champions hit and  reveals them for 3 seconds. It also collects  Mist Wraiths it hits.

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging basic attacks and abilities against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Harrowing Crescent, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+50 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+10 Lethality (6.22 − 10 (based on level) armor penetration)

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Blackout: When near an enemy stealthed ward or trap, gain Blackout for 8 seconds (50 second cooldown; 400 range).
You disable surrounding stealthed wards, as well as expose and reveal nearby stealthed wards and traps while Blackout is active.
Unique: Your basic attacks deal ( 2 / 1) bonus true damage to wards.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – BLACKOUT: When near an enemy stealthed  ward or  trap, gain Blackout for 8 seconds (50 second cooldown; 400 range).
You  disable surrounding stealthed wards, as well as  expose and  reveal nearby stealthed wards and traps while Blackout is active.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+12 Lethality (7.47 − 12 (based on level) armor penetration)

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ever Rising Moon: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals bonus physical damage equal to ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a shield for ( 160 / 80) (+ ( 35% / 17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 6 / 12) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 4% armor penetration and 5 bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – EVER RISING MOON: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals bonus physical damage equal to ( 6% /  3%) of target's maximum health and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a  shield for ( 160 /  80) (+ ( 35% /  17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 6 /  12) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:

Unique – Energized: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.
Unique – Sharpshooter: When fully Energized, your next basic attack deals 120 bonus magic damage on-hit. Energized attacks gain 35% bonus range, capped at 150.
